attributes.title: Just as Bad as The President
attributes.review: I thought my life couldn’t get worse and of course here comes Trump to make it worse.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
I opened the app and it took me to my photos and put a whole bunch of pic of trump 🤢👎🏽
It’s complete garbage I don’t recommend it also stole my microwave and my noodles

attributes.title: Too glitchy
attributes.review: Can’t go five mins without it completely blacking out my phone.

attributes.title: no no no no
attributes.review: this app hacked my phone and i had to get a whole new one.... my insurance didn’t cover this and it came out of my pocket. it turned my phone off forever and the screen turned orange and my phone went bald.... do not!! buy this app... take this app off the app store it’s terrible

attributes.title: Doesn’t even work
attributes.review: For some reason when I got the app it was just this big and old Cheeto on the front. It wasn’t even a hot Cheeto, just the orange one. FIX THIS APP DAMMIT

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: It hacked every single app on my phone even my credit card, awful , hated it sad!

attributes.title: Sometimes I don’t wanna be lonely
attributes.review: This whole app is just a waste of time DELETE IT IMMEDIATELY. Honestly there’s nothing I regret more than downloading such a terrible inhumane app

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♂️✨blm
attributes.review: My phone crashed right when i Opened it crazy!? But um yea that’s it 🥰💫🧚🏻‍♀️ Dont download, don’t recommend ☘️🧚🏼‍♂️✨, If their was an option to ban this app I would <3

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: If I could I would leave a worse review this app made my phone glitch now I keep seeing trumps face everywhere

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: this is the worst app (and ran by the most racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, islamophobic, and xenophobic presidential administration) ever. i am beyond embarrassed for my phone to even have to deal with downloading this joke of an app. but im even more embarrassed for the people who downloaded it to genuinely use and watch fox news as they click on the app. #neveragaintrump #settleforbiden #savetiktok
